laboratory_examinations.findings: Triglyceride (TG) levels ranged from 700 to 4000 mg/dL, maximum 7112 mg/dL.
ApoC-II protein was undetectable in the patientâ€™s plasma, below the detectable limit of 1 mg/dL.
Lack of functional apoC-II activity confirmed; lipolytic activity did not enhance with exogenous rhLPL due to the absence of functional apoC-II.
